price: Indeed, the Hour is coming; there is no doubt about it, but most people do not believe.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
